verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> God <S%H410><s%> in His sanctuary; <S%H6944><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him in His mighty <S%H5797><s%> expanse. <S%H7549><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him for His mighty <S%H1369><s%> deeds; <S%H1369><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him according to His excellent <S%H7230><s%> greatness. <S%H1433><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him with trumpet <S%H7782><s%> sound; <S%H8629><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him with harp <S%H5035><s%> and lyre. <S%H3658><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him with timbrel <S%H8596><s%> and dancing; <S%H4234><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him with stringed <S%H4482><s%> instruments <S%H4482><s%> and pipe. <S%H5748><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him with loud <S%H9615><s%> cymbals; <S%H6767><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him with resounding <S%H8643><s%> cymbals. <S%H6767><s%>
Let everything <S%H3605><s%> that has breath <S%H5397><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord. <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
